column5: Hi Everyone,  I have had many requests to open earlier on weekends during the ice fishing season. We are now open at 7:00 am on Saturdays and Sundays to accomodate all those that are ice fishing.  We had quite a storm yesterday and the walleye were not as active yesterday as it was other days. I fished at Peats Point in the morning and at Deseronto in the afternoon and evening and not many fish were being caught by anyone.  Hope to see some of you on the ice and remember to be safe.  Best regards, Sam
Thanks for the info on your new hours and fishing report Sam.  Must be nice to live so close to all those eyes. I'd be going stir crazy waiting for my next chance to get at 'em.

Hi Carp,  Yes you're right it might be great living next to all of these eyes, however I have been extremely busy that the only time I finally get a chance to get out it was during a storm.  I am going to get out a couple of times this week and hopefully I will have a more positive report to post.  Regards, Sam
